reviews.review:
This is a good movie - not great.  It has a few surprises, a good blending of the various characters, but it left me unsatisfied as the ending was just too abrupt.

The movie definitely centered on Thanos, and Thor and Gamorra were definitely the characters to watch in this film as their roles were very central to the movie.

I am guessing that Dr. Strange's role will be key in the follow up film due out May 2019.
I know I'm invested in many of the characters but it made me cry. Great movie, my kids and husband enjoyed it as well.

I liked the movie but I did not appreciate the fact we didn't get to really see certain characters really at all in their movie. Also the fact that they killed off some characters that will come back later. So what was the point of killing them in the first place? For this I am at a even review of good and bad. I am a huge fan of the mcu but this movie just isn't what I had hoped.

"Avengers : Infinity War" is definitely a "must see" movie for the mcu fans and also a movie for the whole  family. "Infinity War" as to be expected, is full of surprises, action and FUN however i think it lacked a bit of something and it left me with some questions with regards the storyline. Also, i felt like some characters here were kinda wasted in a sense ( thank god they don't have the mutants to spare).
The best cinematographic experience of my life, congratulations to Marvel studios for the accomplishment of such a complex work.

Great movie!! A lot of surprises and kept me on the edge of my seat. I liked that they kept some of the comedic things from Thor and Gaurdians even though this was definitely a darker marvel movie. Also it's great that finally we had a villain have an in depth backstory so we could connect with him.

 I know some people have said that this movie is terrible which I myself can't get. So in regards to them I would like to remind them it's a movie not reality. I mean it's for entertainment. 
I'm not a Marvel lover nor am I DC fanatic I just like superhero movies.
Best movie I have seen in theaters in 10 years.
I wasn't expecting that! I liked how the whole thing felt tense, you could feel the danger.
It was good, until i watched it second time.
total crap, what a waste dont bother sitting through the end credits SPOILERS they are making a captain marvel movie duh!
